content: Bar Rouge是上海标志性的夜生活场所。2004 年，位于外滩 18 号的 Bar Rouge 揭开了上海夜生活的新纪元。 Bar Rouge 迅速成为这座城市的首选场所，其宽敞的露台将高雅风格与无与伦比的上海天际线景观完美结合。 性感的人群、国际 DJ、梦幻般的主题派对和独特的香槟庆祝仪式，夜夜营造出令人惊叹的氛围，成为上海迷人夜生活的标志。
contentEn: SHANGHAI’S ICONIC NIGHTLIFE The opening of Bar Rouge in 2004 atop Bund 18 announced a new era in Shanghai nightlife. Rapidly becoming the city’s go-to venue, Bar Rouge offers a unique combination of high style and unbeatable Shanghai’s skyline views from its spacious terrace. Sexy crowds, international DJs, fantastic theme parties, and unique Champagne celebration rituals, contribute to its amazing ambiance night after night, becoming an icon of Shanghai’s glamorous nightlife.
remarks:

name: Bar Rouge Shanghai
